verses.name: Jeremiah 10:18
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord, Behold, I will sling out the inhabitants of the land at this once, and will distress them, that they may find it so.

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:19
verses.text: Woe is me for my hurt! my wound is grievous: but I said, Truly this is a grief, and I must bear it.

verses.name: Jeremiah 10:20
verses.text: My tabernacle is spoiled, and all my cords are broken: my children are gone forth of me, and they are not: there is none to stretch forth my tent any more, and to set up my curtains.
